title: The best posh biscuits, chosen by Milford retirement home
text:
‘Tea and biscuits bring us together,’ says Joan Lawrence, who attends weekly socials at her local retirement housing in leafy Milford, Surrey. Every Monday, as residents gather in the common room to put the world to rights over a brew, a regular rotation of biscuits are brought out warm from the oven, or passed around in packets on plates.

The bakes are judged right down to the crumb, from the level of crunch in a buttery wafer to the ratio of chocolate on a lime melt.

So, who better to consult when seeking out the very best? This week, we challenged Joan and her friends to taste the newest luxury biscuits, plus some classic ones, too.

But which will earn a coveted place at next Monday’s meeting?...
description: ‘Tea and biscuits bring us together,’ says Joan Lawrence, who attends weekly socials at her local retirement housing in leafy Milford, Surrey.
